message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG 

The paper deals with the problem of extracting text from broadcast videos, which is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also uses OCR (Optical Character Recognition) for text recognition, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM). The paper involves the use of edge density-based methods and tracking algorithms, which are commonly used in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper also involves the use of machine learning techniques for text recognition, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG).
